Author: SF-XIV
Name: Visibility+
Description:
Fork of Visibility plugin. Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.
Includes VoidList, which is a better blacklist.
Accessible via /pvis
More information available via /xlhelp.
Punchline: Fork of Visibility plugin. Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions. (FP-Edition)
